hero.title: Supporting Diverse Communities Across NSW
hero.description: Empowering multicultural communities through settlement support, aged care, family services, and community engagement programs tailored to your needs.

serviceCards.sectionDescription: Culturally appropriate services designed to meet the unique needs of multicultural communities across NSW

settlement.title: Settlement Support
settlement.description: Comprehensive support for new arrivals including housing assistance, employment guidance, and community orientation.

agedCare.title: Aged Care Services
agedCare.description: Culturally appropriate aged care services that respect traditions and provide comfort in familiar languages.

familySupport.title: Family Support
familySupport.description: Programs designed to support families through challenges and build stronger community connections.

communityEngagement.title: Community Engagement
communityEngagement.description: Creating opportunities for community participation, cultural celebration, and social connection.

footer.description: Supporting multicultural communities across NSW with culturally appropriate services and programs.
